post_title: FS - T206 Highly graded PSA Evers Portrait (no name)
post_content: For Sale - A unique T206 Johnny Evers Portrait P350 - PSA 6(mc) no name shows.  Razor sharp $1250 venmo no fee or $1290 pp gs.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
